name: Druid
description: A wielder of nature's magic who can cast spells and shapeshift into beasts.

1.name: Druidic
1.description: You know Druidic, a secret language used to leave hidden messages that require a DC 15 Perception check to spot.

1.name: Spellcasting
1.description: Use Wisdom to cast druid spells. You know cantrips, prepare spells after a long rest, can cast rituals and use a druidic focus.

2.name: Wild Shape
2.description: As an action, transform into a beast you've seen twice per rest, with CR limits based on level and restrictions on flying and swimming.

2.name: Wild Companion
2.description: Expend a use of Wild Shape to cast find familiar, summoning a fey spirit that lasts for hours equal to half your druid level.

2.name: Druid Circle
2.description: Choose a druid circle, gaining additional features at levels 2, 6, 10 and 14.

4.name: Wild Shape Improvement
4.description: Your Wild Shape form options improve according to the Beast Shapes table.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2, two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

4.name: Cantrip Versatility
4.description: Whenever you gain an Ability Score Improvement, you can replace a druid cantrip you know.

6.name: Druid Circle feature
6.description: You gain a feature from your chosen druid circle.

8.name: Wild Shape Improvement
8.description: Your Wild Shape form options improve according to the Beast Shapes table.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: Increase one ability score by 2, two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

10.name: Druid Circle feature

14.name: Druid Circle feature

16.name: Ability Score Improvement
16.description: Increase one ability score by 2, two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

18.name: Timeless Body
18.description: For every 10 years that pass, your body ages only 1 year.

18.name: Beast Spells
18.description: You can cast many druid spells while in beast form without providing somatic or verbal components.

19.name: Ability Score Improvement
19.description: Increase one ability score by 2, two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

20.name: Archdruid
20.description: Use Wild Shape an unlimited number of times and ignore the verbal and somatic components of druid spells.
